name: Nodes Exam
title: Regional Nodes Examined
notes: **Note:**  Record this field even if there has been preoperative treatment.
rows: 1 - 89 nodes examined (code exact number of regional lymph nodes examined)
No regional nodes removed, but aspiration or core biopsy of regional nodes performed
Regional lymph node removal documented as sampling and number of nodes unknown/not stated
Regional lymph node removal documented as dissection and number of nodes unknown/not stated
Regional lymph nodes surgically removed but number of lymph nodes unknown/not stated and not documented as sampling or dissection; nodes examined, but number unknown

Unknown if nodes were examined; not applicable or negative 
Not documented in patient record
